prompts: Create a playful, bipedal Pokemon with distinct stripes and a charismatic personality.
Show me a medium-sized Pokemon that has a unique mix of brown and yellow colors.
Imagine a watchful Pokemon that thrives in urban environments with a friendly demeanor.
Design a normal-type Pokemon that is always alert and has a signature waving gesture.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a friendly watchdog, perfect for companionship and vigilance.
Generate an image of a Pokemon with a charming smile, standing proudly with its tail raised.
Make a lively Pokemon that is known for its keen eyesight and playful antics in grassy areas.

distinctive_features: Tail raised in a waving position
